thematicGrid.name: Checking Operations
thematicGrid.description: A checking operation checks if one or more OBJECTs pass a test described by one or more ALGORITHMs or RULEs. The OBJECTs are retrieved from a SOURCE. All tested OBJECTs are identified by one or more COMPARISONs or PRIMARY_KEYs. The result of the test is described by a REPORT. This category bases on the VerbNet classes sight-30.2, peer-30.3 and investigate-35.4

thematicRole.name: COMPARISON
thematicRole.description: The entity compared with the main OBJECT

thematicRole.name: RULE
thematicRole.description: Defines how decisions were made by the ACTION

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: REPORT
thematicRole.description: Additional detailed information on the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Concluding Operations
thematicGrid.description: A Concluding Operation takes a set of ATTRIBUTEs and derives an OBJECT or REPORT from them. The way of the concludation is described by an ACTION, RULE or ALGORITHM.

thematicRole.name: RULE
thematicRole.description: Defines how decisions were made by the ACTION

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: ATTRIBUTE
thematicRole.description: An attribute which will be part of the resulting OBJECT

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: REPORT
thematicRole.description: Additional detailed information on the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Converting Operations
thematicGrid.description: A converting operation transforms an OBJECT from the SOURCE_FORMAT into the DESTINATION_FORMAT by using an INSTRUMENT, ALGORITHM or RULE. This category bases on the VerbNet classes convert-26.6.2 and Turn-26.6.1

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: RULE
thematicRole.description: Defines how decisions were made by the ACTION

thematicRole.name: DESTINATION_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the output(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Creating Operations
thematicGrid.description: A creating operation creates a new OBJECT and initialises certain of its ATTRIBUTEs. The created OBJECT could be identified by the PRIMARY_KEY or its NAME. The created OBJECT exists at the DESTINATION and owned by the OWNER. This category bases on the VerbNet classes create-26.4 and engender-27. A creating operation creates the OBJECT and could put it somewhere. This is in contrast to a putting operation which only (!) puts the OBJECT somewhere.

thematicRole.name: DESTINATION
thematicRole.description: A destination for an object associated with the component

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: ATTRIBUTE
thematicRole.description: An attribute which will be part of the resulting OBJECT

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: OWNER
thematicRole.description: The entity the OBJECT belongs to.

thematicGrid.name: Describing Operations
thematicGrid.description: A describing operation describes one or many OBJECTs by analyzing the OBJECT itself or one or many of its ATTRIBUTEs. If there are many OBJECTs, the described ones have to identified by a COMPARISON or PRIMARY_KEY. The result of this kind of operation is a YES_NO_ANSWER or a REPORT. If the described is stored at the DESTINATION, its FORMAT should be specified. This category bases on VerbNet class characterize-29.2

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: COMPARISON
thematicRole.description: The entity compared with the main OBJECT

thematicRole.name: FORMAT
thematicRole.description: Data format of the OBJECT, ATTRIBUTE, METADATA, etc.

thematicRole.name: ATTRIBUTE
thematicRole.description: An attribute which will be part of the resulting OBJECT

thematicRole.name: YES-NO-ANSWER
thematicRole.description: The boolean-result of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: REPORT
thematicRole.description: Additional detailed information on the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Duplicating Operations
thematicGrid.description: A duplicating operation creates a copy of an OBJECT which completely equals the OBJECT. If the OBJECT or its copy are persistent, they may have a specific FORMAT. This category bases on the VerbNet class transcribe-25.4.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: OWNER
thematicRole.description: The entity the OBJECT belongs to.

thematicGrid.name: Establishing Operations
thematicGrid.description: Establishes an OBJECT to or with a DESTINATION belonging to a PARTICIPANT. The syntax of the communication with the DESTINATION may follow a specific FORMAT. The PARTICIPANT is addressed by a COMPARISON, NAME, PRIMARY_KEY or a RULE. The OBJECT with the DESTINATION is closed after a TIME_TO_LIVE. This category bases on the VerbNet class establish-55.5

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: RULE
thematicRole.description: Defines how decisions were made by the ACTION

thematicRole.name: PARTICIPANT
thematicRole.description: Other participants of the ACTION beside the AGENT

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: TIME_TO_LIVE
thematicRole.description: Time frame the action has to finish in

thematicGrid.name: Extracting Operations
thematicGrid.description: An Extracting Operations seperates a sub-set of data, the OBJECT, from a set of data, the SOURCE. The seperation is described by an ACTION, a RULE or an ALGORITHM.

thematicRole.name: RULE
thematicRole.description: Defines how decisions were made by the ACTION

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Getting Operations / Getter
thematicGrid.description: A getting operation returns one or many OBJECTs from a SOURCE in memory. If there are many OBJECTs, the returned OBJECTs could be identified by the PRIMARY_KEY or COMPARISON. This category based on VerbNet class get-13.5.1.

thematicRole.name: COMPARISON
thematicRole.description: The entity compared with the main OBJECT

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicGrid.name: Mathematical Operations
thematicGrid.description: A mathematical operation computes the OBJECT by applying a mathematical FORMULA to one or more OPERANDs. In case of many OBJECTs, their ORDERING should be specified. This category bases on the VerbNet class multiply-108.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: ORDERING
thematicRole.description: The ordering of the returned OBJECTs

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: FORMULA
thematicRole.description: Formula used to compute a value

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: OPERAND
thematicRole.description: Argument of the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Merging Operations
thematicGrid.description: A merging operation takes at least two OBJECTS or certain of their ATTRIBUTEs from SOURCE and combines them. Their combination is stored at DESTINATION. If set of affected OBJECTs could be limited by specifying a LIMIT. This category bases on VerbNet class mix-22.1.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: LIMIT
thematicRole.description: The entity used to limit the ACTION space (e.g. maximum number of OBJECTs to return)

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Parsing Operations
thematicGrid.description: A Parsing Operation reads ATTRIBUTEs from a SOURCE in order to create an OBJECT. The OBJECT is initialized with the read ATTRIBUTEs. The expected structure of the SOURCE is described by the SOURCE_FORMAT. The way the SOURCE is read and the OBJECT is created could be specified by an ALGORITHM. A Parsing Operation could delegate sub-tasks to an INSTRUMENT.

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: ATTRIBUTE
thematicRole.description: An attribute which will be part of the resulting OBJECT

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Putting Operations
thematicGrid.description: A putting operation takes an existing OBJECT and puts to a DESTINATION, e.g. a collection or datastore. The PRIMARY_KEY or the NAME identifies the OBJECT at the DESTINATION. The OBJECT comes from the SOURCE. In contrast to a creating operation, a putting operation just puts the OBJECT somewhere. A creating operation creates the OBJECT and (!) could put it in somewhere. This category is based on VerbNet class put-9.1.

thematicRole.name: DESTINATION
thematicRole.description: A destination for an object associated with the component

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: DESTINATION_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the output(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Removing Operations
thematicGrid.description: A removing operation removes one or many OBJECTs from the DESTINATION. The removed OBJECT(s) are identified by the PRIMARY_KEY, COMPARISON or RULE. The number of removed OBJECTs could be limited by specifying a LIMIT. This category bases on the VerbNet classes remove-10.1 and destoy-44

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: OPERAND
thematicRole.description: Argument of the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Resetting Operations
thematicGrid.description: A Resetting Operations turns the OBJECT into its original state. The original values set to the OBJECT are described by a specified SOURCE.

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicGrid.name: Searching Operations
thematicGrid.description: A searching operation searches for one or many OBJECTs at SOURCE. The searched OBJECTs are identified by one or many COMPARISONs or PRIMARY_KEYs. The number of found OBJECTs could be limited by specifying a LIMIT. In case of many OBJECTs an ORDERING for them could be specified. The ALGORITHM defines the way the OBJECTs are searched. This category bases on the VerbNet classes Search-35.2 and obtain-13.5.2.

thematicRole.name: INSTRUMENT
thematicRole.description: The entity with which or through which an action is performed

thematicRole.name: ORDERING
thematicRole.description: The ordering of the returned OBJECTs

thematicRole.name: COMPARISON
thematicRole.description: The entity compared with the main OBJECT

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: LIMIT
thematicRole.description: The entity used to limit the ACTION space (e.g. maximum number of OBJECTs to return)

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicGrid.name: Sending Operations
thematicGrid.description: A sending operation informs one or many OBJECTs located at one ore many DESTINATIONs about an event. The notification takes place via a MESSAGE in a specific FORMAT. This category is based on VerbNet classes tell-37.2 and send-11.1.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: MESSAGE
thematicRole.description: Feedback information given by the ACTION in (structured) natural language

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Setting Operation / Setter
thematicGrid.description: A setting operation takes one or many OBJECTs and puts them to a DESTINATION in memory. If there are many OBJECTs, the returned OBJECTs could be identified by the PRIMARY_KEY or COMPARISON.

thematicRole.name: COMPARISON
thematicRole.description: The entity compared with the main OBJECT

thematicRole.name: PRIMARY_KEY
thematicRole.description: The entity that uniquely identifies the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicGrid.name: Starting Operations
thematicGrid.description: Starts the one ore many OBJECTs. In this case a OBJECT represents a process or another action. This category is based on VerbNet class begin-55.1.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Substituting Operations
thematicGrid.description: A substituting operation replaces one or many OBJECTs with another objects from SOURCE at DESTINATION. This category bases on VerbNet class exchange-13.6.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: SOURCE_FORMAT
thematicRole.description: The FORMAT of the input(s) of an ACTION

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicGrid.name: Throwing Operations
thematicGrid.description: Throws an OBJECT to one or many DESTINATIONs. This category bases on VerbNet class throw-17.1.

thematicRole.name: NAME
thematicRole.description: Non-numerical identifier of the OBJECT

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicGrid.name: Traversing Operations
thematicGrid.description: A traversing operation visits all data OBJECTs located in a SOURCE and applies an ALGORITHM on each OBJECT. The result of the traverse process could be described by a REPORT. If the traversion runs concurrently, it maybe has a TIME_TO_LIVE after which it is terminated. This category bases on the VerbNet class swarm-47.5.1

thematicRole.name: SOURCE
thematicRole.description: The origin of an object associated to the component

thematicRole.name: ACTION
thematicRole.description: A function performed by the component

thematicRole.name: OBJECT
thematicRole.description: The object, target or result of an action. It can also reference the system implementing a described functionality

thematicRole.name: ALGORITHM
thematicRole.description: Set of instructions to perform the ACTION

thematicRole.name: TIME_TO_LIVE
thematicRole.description: Time frame the action has to finish in

thematicRole.name: REPORT
thematicRole.description: Additional detailed information on the ACTION
